block.p: The following equity and convertible debt offerings are expected this week:
Advanced Switching Communications, Vienna, Va., an initial public offering of 6.25 million shares. Morgan Stanley Dean Witter.
The following equity and convertible debt offerings are expected this week:
Advanced Switching Communications, Vienna, Va., an initial public offering of 6.25 million shares. Morgan Stanley Dean Witter.
Albany Molecular Research, Albany, 4.1 million shares. Deutsche Bank Alex. Brown.
Asia Global Crossing, Hamilton, Bermuda, an initial public offering of 53 million Class A shares. Goldman, Sachs and Salomon Smith Barney.
Coach Inc., New York, an initial public offering of 7.38 million shares. Goldman, Sachs.
Computer Network Technology, Minneapolis, 3.7 million shares. Bear, Stearns & Co.
Corinthian Colleges, Santa Ana, Calif., three million shares. Credit Suisse First Boston.
Delcath Systems, Stamford, Conn., an initial public offering of two million shares. Whale Securities Co.
InforMax, Rockville, Md., an initial public offering of five million shares. Bear, Stearns & Co.
Introgen Therapeutics, Austin, Tex., an initial public offering of five million shares. SG Cowen.
Kosan Biosciences, Hayward, Calif., an initial public offering of five million shares. Lehman Brothers.
Natural MicroSystems, Framingham, Mich., two million shares. Deutsche Bank Alex. Brown.
New Skies Satellites, the Netherlands, an initial public offering of 28.5 million American depository shares, each share representing one ordinary share. Goldman, Sachs.
NVIDIA Corp., Sunnyvale, Calif., 1.4 million shares. Morgan Stanley Dean Witter.
Oplink Communications, San Jose, Calif., an initial public offering of 13.7 million shares. Robertson Stephens.
Radiance Medical Systems, Irvine, Calif., 2.8 million shares. Prudential Securities and Gruntal & Co.
Shaw Group, Baton Rouge, La., four million shares. Merrill Lynch and Credit Suisse First Boston.
Tality, San Jose, Calif., an initial public offering of 12.75 million Class A shares. Goldman, Sachs.
Thomson Multimedia, Boulogne, France, 41.66 million American depository shares, each share representing one ordinary share. SG Cowen.
TNPC, Greenwich, Conn., an initial public offering of 21 million shares. Donaldson, Lufkin & Jenrette and Credit Suisse First Boston.
Ulticom, Mount. Laurel, N.J., 4.25 million shares. Lehman Brothers.
